title: SS.PT.474
prompt: What is the “element that won’t mix” in this cartoon?
description: The political cartoon, from Puck magazine, shows Columbia stirring the bowl “Citizenship” with the spoon “Equal Rights.” People from many nations are shown in the bowl and another figure waving an Irish flag in one hand and a knife in the other. The caption reads, “The mortar of assimilation - and the one element that won’t mix.”
feedback: In the cartoon Columbia - dressed like the Statue of Liberty - stirring the bowl of immigrants with the spoon of equal rights. From the caption we learn that there is “one element that won’t mix.” That element from the cartoon is the Irish immigrant jumping in carrying a flag and waving a knife, symbolizing that Irish immigrants were not thought of as equals during this time period.
